alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 2:13PM PST until January 22 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM SATURDAY TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Holden Village, Stevens Pass, and Stehekin. * WHEN...From 10 AM Saturday to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult over Stevens Pass. Blowing snow with reduced visibility and broken tree branches possible with winds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of up to one inch per hour is expected Saturday afternoon through Saturday evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
